Bit Rate's Stage.title: Opening Ceremonies
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Join us as we welcome everypony back to our fourth online event! Learn a little about our staff and get hyped for our incredible lineup of events.

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Concert: BlackIceMusic
Bit Rate's Stage.description:
Producing music since 2014, BlackIceMusic was originally inspired by Martin Garrix on the commercial side and Woodentoaster/Glaze on the fandom side and more recently created a similar sound to his current idol Dirty Palm.
With the goal to create pony-themed Bounce and Future House and being mostly known for tracks like "Sweet and Sour", "Updraft" and "The Fuff", he has come quite a long way.

He recently picked up DJing as a hobby and had his first live performances at two small conventions, followed by several online events like BABSConline, Burning Mare and Trotcon. With a set mostly featuring Melbourne/Future Bounce, as well as Future House, BlackIceMusic is guaranteed to bring energy to your speakers and headphones

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Concert: Drummershy
Bit Rate's Stage.description:
Drummershy is a drummer/musician based out of Baltimore Maryland. He is a Certified Music and Audio Production Engineer. He is also the current drummer in the Baltimore band, Flying Jacob.

He has collaborated and Performed with many internet musicians such as Cyril The Wolf, 4Everfreebrony, Tarby, L Train, Luckrock, Vylet pony, Princewhateverer, Geekbrony, Djohn Mema, Stealing shad3z, MelodyBrony and many more.

He is recognized by fandom artists and musicians such as Forest Rain, The Living Tombstone, John Kenza, Lavender, Brian Comotto (Composer for ABC's "All my Children") Chi-Chi, Gunderslam, Jeff Scott Soto, Derek Sherinian, and Bumblefoot (Sons of Apollo), Doll skin, Gabriel C Brown, Cathy Weseluck, Michelle Creber, Claire Corlett, and Ian James Corlett for his drumming and artistic craft.

He continues to drum for fandom's and internet music collaborations.

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Brony Church - Why Adults Watch Ponies
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Why do they matter to us? What impact has the show had on our community over the last decade? How do small pastel ponies made for kids appeal to adults? Strap yourself in and prepare for someone to show you exactly why this show matters to you and why you keep watching; Fiaura has got the Psychology of Ponies and the Adult Human Mind.

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Build an OC
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Let's all join forces and create an epic OC together! Audience participation highly encouraged as I describe drawing techniques through the process. The resulting creation will be auctioned off for charity.

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Charity Auction
Bit Rate's Stage.description: The charity auctions you love at your favorite conventions try to make the leap to online - Join Perry, fabulous items and possible headwear in raising money for NAMI, the National Alliance on Mental Illness

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Critical Foal: Community Guest RPG
Bit Rate's Stage.panelists: Eliwood Sain, Thoth, Ascential, Pirate Dash
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Join our Tabletop crew and some very special guests as they tell a fantastic story off the top of their heads with a healthy dosage of Fuf

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Riffing Rainbow 5.0: The Fufpire Strikes Back
Bit Rate's Stage.panelists: Thoth, Acesential, Forward Progress, Argembarger, Kevin, TJ Pirate Dash, Simul
Bit Rate's Stage.description: It's back and worse than ever!  Join RiffPonies and their rowdy gang of returning community guest stars as they attempt to traverse more bad Pony fan-fiction from the spidery pen of Argembarger!  Grammar will be defied, precious brain cells will be lost, and they'll try their ABSOLUTE HARDEST not to say a certain word you all know & love so much...

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Playing with Lasers
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Laser etching ponies onto various metal things! Anodized titanium, tiny books, and maybe a shotglass or two!

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Sketches From A Hat
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Sketches from a Hat returns because what PonyFest would be complete without it?! Viewers will be able to submit suggestions, and the panelists will select ideas at random to draw, while also doing Q&A and having a great time with everyone! So round up your friends, come on down, and who knows? You might end up with free art!

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Voice Actor Q&A
Bit Rate's Stage.panelists: Ian Hanlin, Devyn Dalton, Giles Panton, Foal Papers
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Meet the voices of Sunburst, Ocellus, and Flash Magnus for some Q&A. Be sure to bring some questions!

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Rustle your Big Jimmies
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Returning since his appearance at the very first PonyFest, Jim Miller once again gets together with Foal Papers to share insights into MLP:FiM and animation in general.He’ll also be taking some of your questions, so bring your very best!

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Music Manager Stories
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Managing musicians doesn't always go according to plan... Actually, it NEVER goes according to plan. We are here to tell you the told (and untold) stories of managing musicians.

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Closing Ceremonies
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Another epic Saturday for the books. Join us for reflections, thanks yous, and special announcements regarding the future of PonyFest Online!

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Concert: Nevermourn
Bit Rate's Stage.description: Hi, I'm Nevermourn! You might have caught some of my sets at various US cons while we were still having those. I mainly produce and DJ drum and bass, and I've been on various community albums between Ponies at Dawn and A State of Sugar. I like to touch as many genres as I can in a set, so be sure to tune in for a taste of everything!

Bit Rate's Stage.title: Concert: Faulty
Bit Rate's Stage.description: The Self proclaimed King of Progressive House in the current day Pony Fandom will be bringing you nothing but the best music of the Pony EDM scene!

Neural Net's Stage.title: Unicorns and Other Fable-Equines
Neural Net's Stage.description: This is a scientific but entertaining presentation about the development of unicorns and other equine creatures from human mythology through the centuries. We all know and love the ponies of the series, but few of us have examined the role of equine characters in myths and legends predating My Little Pony.

Neural Net's Stage.title: Animating Live! (With Minty, Neko, Hyper, and Hoers)
Neural Net's Stage.panelists: Hyper Dash, Minty Root, CaptainHoers, NekoSnicker
Neural Net's Stage.description: Watch animators Minty Root, NekoSnicker, Hyper Dash and CaptainHoers animate ponies live! We'll answer your questions, have a good time, and hopefully have a little bit of animation to show you by the end!

Neural Net's Stage.title: MLP Villain History & Theory
Neural Net's Stage.description:
What do My Little Pony Gen 1 and Gen 4 have in common?
The Villains!
Join as we go into the lore of some of our favorite villains and just how evil they got.

Neural Net's Stage.title: Picking Apart the Streaming of Art
Neural Net's Stage.description: Livestreaming your Artwork levels up your art more than you think. It can help you grow faster, easier, keeps you motivated, and you'll be more consistent. Whether or not you have no skills in streaming - this panel will expand into it. Join me as I set you up with the basics. Allow me to help you grow past a seedling. If you're itching to ask something- there will be a QnA. Just know: Livestreaming art can lay out a start by being smart and true at heart.

Neural Net's Stage.title: Transformative vs Derivative - An Exploration of Fanfiction in the Age of Franchise
Neural Net's Stage.description: The concept of fanfiction is as old as storytelling from each new generation riffing on stories of the past to Don Quixote’s unauthorized sequel to Alan Moore’s idea of a Literary Game. How did franchise culture change this? Can one legally publish their fanfiction? What makes one “transformative”. Join as we look at works like The Air Pirates, Wind Done Gone, Watchmen, even Lauren Faust’s My Little Pony & analyze the history of fanfiction from the last century and its impact on modern culture.

Neural Net's Stage.title: Drawing4Exposure
Neural Net's Stage.description: A panel of starving artists. A bloodthirsty crowd. Suggestions in a hat. MidnightPremiere and the Dootz Crew challenge the audience in a desperate battle of wills. Drawing materials are provided; all art produced will be donated to the charity auction!

Neural Net's Stage.title: Learning to Laugh at Everything Terrible (Now with 200% more Ponies)
Neural Net's Stage.description: A how to guide on how to write comedy from the basics, the sub genres, and a little dabble into the ghastly.

Neural Net's Stage.title: Shipping, Actually
Neural Net's Stage.description: A panel by Monochromatic and Nyronus about love and writing stories about cute ponies being in love.

Neural Net's Stage.title: Family is Magic: My Experience as a Brony Dad Thus Far
Neural Net's Stage.description: Are you a brony or pegasister and thinking about or have decided to take the giant step into the magical world of parenthood? Or maybe you already have children and would like to connect with other parents in the fandom? Either way, this panel's for you! Come join Sunchaser as he talks about his experience so far raising his now seven month-old daughter, lessons he's learned along the way, and his perspective on how the Elements of Harmony can be applied to bring magic into your family.

Neural Net's Stage.title: Bronypalooza History Panel
Neural Net's Stage.panelists: Drummershy, Tarby, F3nning, P1K, Cyril the Wolf
Neural Net's Stage.description: From the Beginnings of 2011-2019, The bronypalooza Band members share storys of Working,and Playing and at the Biggest My little pony convention in the world. Join Tarby, Poni1kenobi,Drummershy, and F3nning as they share storys and memories of playing at a convention. They might even answer your questions about why they were apart of the Bronypalooza Bands.

Neural Net's Stage.title: Late Night Con Nightmares
Neural Net's Stage.description: Join a bunch of worn out, hyped up on candy staffers and vendors as they share some of their horror stories and experiences at different cons. At this late hour we let loose on the horrors and drama behind the con scenes, though here’s the catch, no cons or individuals will be named in this panel. From behind the scenes fires that almost ruined an event to dealings of craziness with rowdy guests we lay it all out.

Tabletop.title: Codenames
Tabletop.description: Become a secret agent trying to identify your fellow spies in the field using only their Codenames in this word association game.

Tabletop.title: The Resistance
Tabletop.description: Join a resistance movement trying to take down an evil imperial government whose spies are trying to stop you in this team-based hidden role game.

Tabletop.title: Tails of Equestria
Tabletop.description: Become a young denizen of Equestria as you go on an adventure with your friends and learn more about the power of Friendship.

Tabletop.title: Root RPG
Tabletop.description: Caught in the middle of a war between industrialist cats and monarchical birds; become a vagabond and help out the various forest denizens who cast you out from society.
